name: Plaza Mayor of Lima
description: The historic heart of Lima, surrounded by important colonial buildings such as the Government Palace and the Cathedral.

name: Magic Water Circuit
address: Jr. Madre de Dios S/N, Cercado de Lima 15046
description: An impressive complex of water fountains with light and music shows in the Park of the Reserve.

name: Huaca Pucllana
description: A pre-Incan adobe pyramid located in the middle of the modern district of Miraflores.

name: Barranco
description: The bohemian neighborhood of Lima, known for its street art, galleries, bars, and the famous Bridge of Sighs.

name: Larco Museum
description: Houses a vast collection of Peruvian pre-Columbian art, including pottery, textiles, and metals.

name: Park of Love
description: A romantic park on the Miraflores boardwalk with views of the Pacific Ocean and the sculpture 'The Kiss'.

name: Surquillo Market
address: Av. Paseo de la Republica 5325, Surquillo 15047
description: A vibrant local market where you can find fresh produce, Peruvian ingredients, and try typical food.

name: Church and Convent of San Francisco
address: Jr. Lampa and Jr. Ancash, Historic Center of Lima
description: Famous for its baroque architecture and its underground catacombs housing thousands of skeletal remains.
